BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[TAMER_nameFull] forma un vínculo profundo con [ANIMAL_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[TAMER_nameFull] se da cuenta de su amor por [ANIMAL_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->mientras [human_pronoun] mira a [ANIMAL_nameDef] a los ojos

BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[PURSUER_nameFull] susurra cosas dulces al oído de [ACCEPTER_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[PURSUER_nameFull] lleva a [ACCEPTER_nameFull] de la mano hacia la cama [circumstance_group]
image->[PURSUER_nameFull] brincando en la cama con [ACCEPTER_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->con poca ropa a la vista
desc_sentence->[PURSUER_nameFull] y [ACCEPTER_nameFull] se miran a los ojos.
desc_sentence->[PURSUER_nameFull] está oliendo el cabello de [ACCEPTER_nameFull].

Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[DUMPER_nameDef] sentando a [REJECTED_nameFull] a la mesa para una charla poco placentera [circumstance_group]
image->[DUMPER_nameDef] está de pie a corta distancia de [REJECTED_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[DUMPER_nameDef] empujando a [REJECTED_nameFull] fuera de la cama [circumstance_group]
circumstance_phrase->en un momento de gran tristeza
desc_sentence->[REJECTED_nameDef] llora y se arranca los cabellos al mismo tiempo.
desc_sentence->[REJECTED_nameDef] a colapsado en el suelo y está temblando.

Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.li: image->[SPOUSE1_nameFull] diciendo sus votos matrimoniales a [SPOUSE2_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[SPOUSE1_nameFull] caminando hacia el altar matrimonial con [SPOUSE2_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
image->[SPOUSE1_nameFull] agarrándose de las manos con [SPOUSE2_nameFull] durante la ceremonia de matrimonio [circumstance_group]
